Name: Reana 'Cheo' Bustamente
Description: Reana was stabbed multiple times in the chest.

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
According to witnesses, the victim was shot by persons who drove by in a vehicle.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Tribuna Online, online portal, 7.01.2011

Name: Génesis Briget Makaligton
Description:
Genesis was around 23 to 27 years of age. Her body was left in front of a pharmacy, next to the body of an unidentified man. According to media reports, the deaths occurred between 4 and 6 pm in different locations. The perpetrators immediately fled the scene.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: IGLHRC, online portal, 12.01.2011; Inter-American Commission on Human Rights, Press Release No 4/11, 20.01.2011

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim's was found on the 8th completely burnt in the forest area of La Marquesa. As the body did not show any wounds, the police assume the victim was burnt alive. She was around 30 years of age.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: El Sol de Toluca, 9.1.2011

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim is identified in the news as 'bading' and was allegedly salvaged by three people and dumped by the shore.

TvT partner organization. STRAP

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim's body was found in the morning of the 9th in a crouched position, leaned against a tree in a construction area. She was about 20 to 25 years old and her body had eight bullet wounds in the face, chest and arms.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: La Policiaca, online portal, 9.1.2011

Name: Adriana
Description:
According to the police, the crime happened around 9 pm on a highway. Adriana was working as a sex worker, waiting for clients. A car with two unidentified men is reported to have stopped nearby. One of them got out of the car and, without talking, fired numerous shots at Adriana.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: O Globo/A Gazeta Online, 13.01.11 10 ----------------------- Page 11-----------------------

Name: Krissy Bates
Description:
Krissy was found strangled on Linden Avenue.

She had been worried about her safety in the weeks leading up to the homicide after being was sexually aussaulted.

Her murderer was a man she met online and started to date for a short time. The murderer confessed that he her Bates by strangling her with his hands. He allegedly moved her body to the floor and saw it "jump." He told police he did not want her to "come back," so he took a folding knife from a hutch and stabbed Bates several times, according to the charges.

Bates' cause of death was complex homicidal violence, with four stab wounds to the torso and one to the left side of the neck. She also had broken ribs, and the hyoid bone in her throat was loosened, a sign of strangulation.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Star Tribune, 13.01.20011 & 21.01.2011

Name: Name Unknown
Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: PB Agora, online portal, 16.01.2011

Name: Laisa (Jose Ramiro Guevara Cortes)
Description:
Laisa's body was found with a stab wound in the neck in the morning of the 30th in her apartment. According to a news report, she was very well-known in the local area. Public authorities assume that it was a homicide or murder.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Cronica del Quindio, 17.1..2011 11 ----------------------- Page 12-----------------------

Name: Fergie (William Afif Hernandez)
Description:
Fergie's body was found dead on a pavement in a residential area. She had gunshot wounds to the head and rib cage.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Athos GLS, online portal, 21.01.2011

Name: Angela (Angel Segundo Pirela Garcia)
Description:
Angela's body was found in the morning of the 17th on the side of a highway in the congregation of Francisco Eugenio Bustamante with shots in the temple, the cheekbone and the head. According to relatives, Angela had been working as a sex worker for three years in different parts of the city and been taking a course to become a hairdresser.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Noticia al Dia, online journal, 19.01.2011

Name: Marcia (Marcio Pereira)
Location: Rua Tufie Mahfud, Centro, Jaragua do Sul, SC
Description:
Marcia was a sex worker. According to a colleague who was nearby, Marcia had been in a car where there was a discussion. The police report that she was shot in the neck, and thrown out of the car. The perpetrator escaped the scene and Marcia died in the emergency room of a hospital. According to her sister, Marcia was from Itajai, but had been living in Jaragua for 15 years,

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: A Noticia Joinville, online journal, 20.01.2011 12 ----------------------- Page 13-----------------------

Name: Mini Britany (Lener Dario Lopez Fernandez)
Description:
Mini was killed in the early morning of the 22th on Calle Portachuelo. While public authorities assumed it was a act of vengeance related to a so-called crime of passion, the trans activist organisation Red-Trebol doubt this is true. Mini had been seen entering a car with two young men and two days later a witness saw the alleged perpetrators dispose Mini's body on a street.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: El Dia, online journal, 24.01.11; La Prensa, online portal, 3.2.2011

Name: Name Unknown
Description: TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; Mural-Toluca, online portal, 29.1.2011

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim was found dead with 20 stabs in the face and the stomach. The alleged perpetrator was the 37-year-old resident of the house in or near which the killing took place. He had already been charged with murder and was facing a long prison sentence.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Tem Mais, online portal, 22.01.2011

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The crime happened in an amusement park in the early morning. On 26 January, the police arrested a man who confessed having stabbed the victim after a discussion.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: VNews, online portal, 24.01.2011 & 26.01.2011 13 ----------------------- Page 14-----------------------

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim was found dead in her house in a little village in the Kostroma region. The dead occured at the beginning of January.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Russian LGBT Network, 23.01.2011

Name: Natasha (Joao Leandro Rosario dos Santos)
Location: Avenida Juscelino Kubitschek de Oliveira, Cidade Industrial, Curitiba
Description:
Natasha was killed on a street where she used to do sex work. According to relatives, she did not have a stable home. The police inform that she had been subject to two attempted murders. According to her aunt, in one of these attacks, one of the aunt's nephews was severely injured.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Parana Online, online portal, 25.01.11

Name: Mariana (Jose Daniel Aricuri)
Description:
Mariana was well-known in the area. She was a sex worker. Her body was found on the 29th on a hill near the city of Oran with 30 machete stabs, mostly in the face. The hands were missing as they had been eaten by swine that are kept by locals and by dogs. The police assume that Mariana was killed at a different place and her body been carried to the hillside around four days earlier.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: 26 Noticias, online portal, 31.1.2011

Name: (Ivo Valentin)
Location: Avenida Marechal Floriano Peixoto, Curitiba, PR
Description:
The victim's body was found dead on the morning of 25 January 2011 with at least three shots in the face. Her panties had been lowered.

TvT partner organization: Grupo Gay da Bahia (Tabelas 2011); Crimes Curitiba, online portal, 25.01.2011

Name: Name Unknown
Description: TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; Mural-Toluca, online portal, 29.1.2011 14 ----------------------- Page 15-----------------------

Name: Alejandra Marin
Description:
Alejandra was a sex worker and supposedly killed by a client.

TvT partner organization: Observatorio Ciudadano Trans

Name: Angie
Description:
Angie was shot five times.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011

Name: Carla
Description:
Carla had been living in the city of Aracaju for months and came to visit her mother. She was shot on 29 January and died on the 31st.

TvT partner organization: Grupo Gay da Bahia

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
Two young trans women were killed in a horrible manner. The cases were not properly examined and simply treated as 'issues of drugs'.

Note that the date of this report is unknown. The date given is based on the position of the corresponding entry in the TGEU list.

TvT Questionnaire research

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
Two young travestis were killed in a horrible manner. The cases were not properly examined and simply treated as 'issues of drugs'.

Note that the date of this report is unknown. The date given is based on the position of the corresponding entry in the TGEU list.

TvT Questionnaire research February 2011
